title: Ticket #2283: IPv6: condor_sockaddr::is_private_network Doesn't catch all
description: condor_sockaddr::is_private_network() (/src/condor_utils/condor_sockaddr.cpp line 403) catches IPv4 private networks and IPv6 link local networks. It ignores the IPv6 private networks (fc00::/7) and IPv6 link local networks (169.254.1.0-169.254.254.255). It should probably do both. (We might consider adding is_linklocal_network(), but to what end? We are curious about "private" networks with the goal of avoiding them and preferring public networks whenever possible.)
